website_summaries.verdict: Simple drinking bowl is durable and reliable.
pros: Bowl collapses for easy storage but holds its shape well when fully extended
Bowl holds water and food with ease
Included clip allows you to easily attach the bowl to a backpack or doggy bag
Large bowl holds up to 5 cups of water
cons: Bowl has an initial plastic scent that takes a few washes to fade away

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality silicone ripped after few uses
customer_reviews.text: After 5 or 6 uses the crease where it folds completely tore apart. This bowl hadn't seen any abnormal usage to warrant the failure so I assume they must use very low quality silicone because I have similar bowls that haven't had this problem whatsoever. When I flex the material, I can see the silicone turn white which I've heard is a sign of poor quality silicone. I would definitely not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With This Bowl
customer_reviews.text: Great size for hiking with my dog. Previously I bought a larger bowl to use on our walks since I have a large dog, but it was too big and uncomfortable moving around on my belt loop. So I bought this 1 1/2 cup collapsible bowl. This bowl is just the right size so it doesn't bother me while we walk. I just refill it instead of having a larger bowl. This is nicely made and has a nice clip to attach it to your back back, belt loop, etc. Good price too. Glad I bought it, so my dog can drink water and I'll be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Louise

customer_reviews.title: Hands Down a Necessity for Dogs on the Go!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these bowls! I just got a new puppy about 3 weeks ago and plan to do a lot of traveling with her. I just took her on a week long trip from az to ny & it wouldn't have gone nearly as smooth if I hadn't had these bowls! I just hooked them on the side of her carrier purse & she has food & water where ever we go! I love that you can extend/collapse individual parts to either make it larger or smaller also. Seriously not 1 bad thing to say about these. I recommend them to any dog owner as a starter kit item.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra C.

customer_reviews.title: perfect size, easy to use, great to travel with
customer_reviews.text: I travel with my service dog frequently and use it mostly for water. This expandable cup is strong enough for our abuse, easy to flatten and store in a briefcase or even a purse (I suggest drying it out first - doh!). Sometimes I also use it for her meals, then rinse it out and put water in it when overnighting on the road. Perfect size. Great color choices. I like the clip, too, for attaching to a leash while walking. Too big to fit in the back pocket of my jeans, but that's okay. Also got one for a friend to keep in her car.
customer_reviews.author: BeHaven

customer_reviews.title: It's very easy to travel with and very easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Our pup loves his new prima pets water bowl! It's very easy to travel with and very easy to clean. We love that it is so light weight and with the carabiner it's an easy clip-and-go! We couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: MEH

customer_reviews.title: Good size for larger dogs...
customer_reviews.text: These bowls were rated highly in the reviews I researched prior to purchasing. They are large enough to water our three big dogs on the trail and appear to sit stable. They are sturdy and should not collapse during use. They also have a hard plastic ring around the top which should protect the bowl when collapsed and in a pack. Bought the two packs so one color for water and one for food. The material used is durable, but is thinner where the bold folds. With a little care during use these bowls should provide good service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have owned some other brands of these, they are super handy for water on the go. i am hoping it will do better than some of the photos shown here. I will post how mine holds up. it collapses slightly different than other brands. i love to keep one in the car , one in my dog bag and other places i might need a quick clean bowl. these wipe out clean and dry. use a napkin at an outdoor restaurant and dry when its time to go, works great! at a dog park or hike, just shake it dry and go.
customer_reviews.author: whatIthink

customer_reviews.title: Good product that does it's job
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak to the durability of the product because I have only been using them for a week, but they are great! Bought these as the DH and I set out on a cross country road trip with our two miniature schnauzers and they love them! This brand seems better made than some of the other brands we have tried. One nice feature about the bowl is that if you are limited on water you can expand it only half way so your pet can still get a drink easily. Probably wouldn't recommend the 2 cup size for very large breeds but should work for most :)
customer_reviews.author: Kaele W

customer_reviews.title: Super for large breeds!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a portable water bowl for large breeds! Let's face it the foldable fabric bowls are totally water proof and honestly they kinda freaked my dogs out. I was always carrying around a plastic storage container for my dogs in the car to drink from because the collapsible ones where just too small. While they are fins for dogs under 30lbs my 90lb Cane Corso couldn't even fix her tounge in it. I was so thrilled when I recieved this to finally have something compact to take on the road for my dogs to drink or eat from. Super durable, great size and love the added carbiner!
customer_reviews.author: Lee De

customer_reviews.title: too fragile
customer_reviews.text: after only a couple of weeks this bowl cracked open along a fold line and became unusable. very disappointed as it was used only lightly; not exposed to sun or chewing or any other trauma. Just hung off the back of my backpack and after less than ten uses fell apart. I can't understand it; I don't live in a hot dry environment. Just put water in it; let the dog drink then drained it out and put it on my pack. Maybe it will work as a frisbee? Or a collar?
customer_reviews.author: Vallemar 2

customer_reviews.title: Great collapsible bowl for giant breeds!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a large/wide collapsible bowl for my St Bernard pup and stumbled on this. I love it. It's perfect and fits his big ol snout. I also LOVE that it can be multi sized. He can be a turd and start playing with the water bowl so I feel better about not wasting as much water this way. Very light weight , compact, and came with a clip to attach to a belt loop or bag. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: eking_sslobo

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought these bowls sooner.
customer_reviews.text: So I can't say how long these bowls are going to last me seeing as I've only had them about two weeks or so but I imagine they're going to last me quite a while. The material they're made out of feels nice and sturdy. I bought the large size and I'm glad I did because it provides enough room for my dog to eat and drink out of them without any issues. I'm looking forward to my next outing so I can use these bowls for the first time. If you're looking for some good travel bowls, take a chance on these. I don't think you're going to be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Happy Pup Loves Her Walks Now
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific portable bowl. It's lightweight, yet holds a decent quantity of water, and is quite sturdy. I love that it conveniently comes with its own carabiner. I have the bowl clipped directly to my dog's walking leash alongside the poop bags. Armed with this and a bottle of fresh water, my pup and I can hygienically share a drink to quench our thirst and cool us down on our walks. Our rounds through the neighborhood are more enjoyable now, and gone are the days when my sweet girl would unnecessarily pant and flag on the journey.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Jo B. Connors

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bowls
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are great for traveling and camping with our dogs. We've had our first set for 3 years and they've held up to our occasional use. We liked the first set enough to buy a second set. The bases are nice and wide which keeps them stable and the accordion segments seem strong enough to last a while. The included clip is big enough to hold 3 bowls together (2 bowls used for food and 1 for water). Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R. Cash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a car trip
customer_reviews.text: I took our dog on a very long car trip recently and was very pleased with the travel bowl. The dog is very large and he found it easy to get as much water as he wanted. The bowl was easy to clean and will be something we keep in the back of the car for all trips. I would recommend this bowl for anyone who goes with a pet in the car. This is definitely a good and practical product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Hembree

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the collapsible dog bowl for my Yellow Lab
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the collapsible dog bowl for my Yellow Lab, Pippin. I often find it impossible to find water stations for my dog. We often take long treks and I have found the collapsible dog bowl perfect for "filling up" anywhere. I liked the collapsible bowl so much I purchased one for a friend who just adopted a new puppy. The silicone dog bowl is well priced, well constructed, light weight and easy to clean. A must have for any dog owner.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I clip this to the shoulder straps of my Camelbak when we go hiking so that my dog can get a drink while we're out. It's light weight and very compact so it doesn't bother me at all while I'm carrying it. I'm a little worried about the rubber wearing through and leaking after prolonged use, but so far it's working perfectly. If it does ever break, I'll definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: K. Childers

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so we could give our pup water when we’re out hiking and walking the trails. It’s absolutely perfect. We have 65lb pound golden lab and the small size was perfect for our needs. I absolutely love the purple color it came in and the carabiner that’s included too. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone. I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J

customer_reviews.title: CUTE AND PRACTICAL.
customer_reviews.text: Obviously, as a pet owner, we want to spoil our pups. I have a husky and all of her stuff is in purple, and they had the typical green and pinks and blue collapsable bowls, but I wanted something purple. I was so excited to find these as they fit my perfect need for my dog! They are a good size for when we are hiking and my dog needs a little water, and it clips right back to her harness. 10/10 I say to buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Avila

customer_reviews.title: Even better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is great! I was worried that it may be too big, but it's perfect as a travel water bowl for our 65-pound pup. Plus, if you don't need the full 5-cup capacity, you can stop at the first expansion size and use it as a 2-cup bowl. I love having options!
customer_reviews.author: Linsay

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs like the cool blue color and size!
customer_reviews.text: Prima Pet Expandable bowls after watching my Dogs drink out of them I want do it also! These are great prior to them I was using a smaller red one with no name on it from Amazon but every Dog seems to like the cool blue color! And it is at least 30% larger enough for 2 Dogs at a time
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Anderson

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves the portable travel bowl!
customer_reviews.text: I take my dog on daily walks. A portable travel bowl is a must for my bulldog to drink from. Daily walks consist of 1 or 2 twenty four ounce bottles, depending on how hot it is. What distinguishes this travel bowl is that the silicone seems to be thicker which means a heavier duty bowl. the bowl does not collapse when he drinks out of it and tips the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: The Big O

customer_reviews.title: perfect for large breed dogs
customer_reviews.text: fits 5 cups of dog food, fills with plenty of water as well. good for on the go. visiting in laws and for long car rides! quality is also good. the silicone is sturdy. UPDATE 7/8/15: what ever you do...DO NOT leave your dog alone with the bowl! my puppy of 4 months tore the thing up like a chew toy... it is still usable but the tore the hard plastic ring off the rest of the bowl so i can no longer latch it to my backpack when we go on our walks but like i said still usable...
customer_reviews.author: mauricio drummond

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, but Small
customer_reviews.text: The bowl itself is good quality, but I bought the 1.5 cup bowl which is too small for a larger dog; I should've bought the 5 cup as I originally planned. The 1.5 cup is narrow in diameter so it's difficult for a dog with a larger muzzle to drink from it. I think the 1.5 cup is suited for smaller muzzled dogs or even cats; not German shepherds.
customer_reviews.author: wenracr

customer_reviews.title: It's so light and small and it's super nice not to have the weight or bulk of ...
customer_reviews.text: L-O-V-E IT!! Received it only a little over a week ago and the purple bowl has already hiked 30 miles with us. It's so light and small and it's super nice not to have the weight or bulk of the non-collapsible plastic bowl in my pack anymore. I have two large 60 lb dogs and these smaller bowls work out just fine for them (which I was concerned about at first). Trust me, when the lives of these bowls come to an end I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Shan

customer_reviews.title: Expandable AND Collapsable
customer_reviews.text: They collapse on command, and they are bowls. This allows them to travel well as they are designed to do. They aren't to small either, the ones I ordered (Large/5 cups) can hold five cups of food or water. They stay expanded, or collapsed based on the position you put them in. Lastly, they are for dogs. That's all I got, I hope you enjoyed reading this review on some collapsible dog bowls.
customer_reviews.author: Justin F

customer_reviews.title: Split after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bowl a couple months ago. I used it for my dogs on hikes and noticed it leaking. The seam split already. All I did was carry it clipped to my belt and gave them water with it. It should have lasted a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jana B.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are great! I have four of them for my papillon’s various travel bags, and they’re just the right size for her. Some of them I’ve had for a year and a half since I got her and they’re still going strong with regular use, including walking, hiking, local trips to restaurants and to visit friends, and road trips and airplane travel to visit family. I even gave one as a gift to a friend who takes her chihuahua backpacking and she loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Sonja BegoniaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: These were a great purchase! There are both identical in size and identical to the color in the photo. They seem to be of great quality and had no problem in the dishwasher on the top rack. The silver clips that come on each bowl are sturdy and are a really nice feature to have as I can clip them on her leash, my backpack, and to my dog's travel water bottle which I also got on amazon at:
customer_reviews.author: Curt MacNeill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog bowl for when on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for when I take my pup out to the park, nail trims at PetSmart and road trips. It’s the perfect size for my 27lb dog to keep him hydrated while out and about. He loves car rides and I love being able to pour him some fresh bottled water on the go living in this dry climate.
customer_reviews.author: LE

customer_reviews.title: Love this collapsible bowl
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is so easy to keep in the car, as it takes up no room, easy to open and fill with water for my dog, and then easy to re-collapse to put back in the car. I always have it with us for our walks. So much nicer than a standard bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Kfcarter

customer_reviews.title: A travel necessity for your pet.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these bowls to take with us when traveling with our dog. They're easy to pack and I like that we can open them up all the way or just half way. I have also used one flat at hotels as a "plate" for dog treats. The wide bottoms make them very stable and the hard plastic rims make it easy to carry them when they have food or water in them. I have a smaller version of these that we take with us in the car for water but I like this larger size for food and water in hotels or friends homes. I think they are a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne S

customer_reviews.title: Great portable bowl
customer_reviews.text: I like how this is larger than the other portable water bowls on Amazon. I take it with me when we take our doggy to the dog park or anywhere really. He doesn't like drinking from the doggy drinking fountains, so I just fill this up at the people fountain and let him drink up. I put it in a plastic bag and stick it in my backpack after so that it doesn't get the inside of my bag all wet. It does come with a clip, but I don't use that.
customer_reviews.author: PiggyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is like the absolute best for traveling!!! We take it when we go hiking allll the time, it’s the perfect size, not too small, not too big. Once she’s done with the water, we dump it out, do a little shakey shake and then fold it up and we’re on our way!
customer_reviews.author: grace minor

customer_reviews.title: Less clutter in my life?  I'll do anything for less clutter...
customer_reviews.text: We hve not gone on a trip yet but I think these bowls are the most wonderful idea. As keeping dogs in a kennel becomes more expensive we are more and more likely to take our beloved dogs on trips with us. It is so exhausting carrying all the loose paraphernalia and blankets to make that happen. Our large metal dog bowls are bulky and "clanky" for walking down a hotel lobby late at night. I love that these bowls are light weight and can fit right in one of our suitcases. Kudos to whoever thought of this. Product arrived promptly and looks like it would be a good enough size when opened. .
customer_reviews.author: Readaholic

customer_reviews.title: These were truly a great purchase. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: much heavier than I'd expected, and more stable than I'd thought possible. These were truly a great purchase. Easy to clean, very flat pon the bottom, and a wonderfully larger size than others I'd look at. Excellent product. I have already recommended to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Golde

customer_reviews.title: great bowl, very durable
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is wonderful. My service dog and I are always out and about and I always have this bowl on me, using it frequently for watering or feeding indoors and outside on a variety of surfaces. My ydog is an eager eater and pushes this bowl all over when he eats out of it. I think I've had it for over a year now, and it is still holding up very well. I also love that it comes with a carabenar for easy carrying It's a bit small for my 60 lb golden/lab cross, but we still love it and I'd still highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kk

customer_reviews.title: A great travel bowl for your dog
customer_reviews.text: The Prima Pet collapsible bowl is so handy. Now I can give my dogs water while we are on our walks. It hooks to your belt, or treat bag, and is out of the way until you need it. It's the right size, and the price is right, too.
customer_reviews.author: S.D. McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: compact and lightweight with carry hook, you don't even know it's at your side. Well Made.
customer_reviews.author: Huester45

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling
customer_reviews.text: These are a good size for my 50-60lb dogs to drink from in the car and at the dog park. They don't slide around in the car on the vinyl and/or leather because they are silicone, and they stay standing well.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Love these bowls!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bowls for my puppy! She's a Cavalier King Charles Spaniel and they're the perfect size. I bought a purple one years ago for my Cavalier that passed. And finally got around to getting a second one. I also bought a large size for our puppy rottweiler. I love this brand in particular because of the beautiful vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Durable at first, then not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bowl I wish I lasted longer. It lasted me a few months then one day another dog poked its long nose in it then the bottom of the bowl ripped off completely into a perfect circle. That dog didn’t even bite anything, it just stuck it’s nose inside.
customer_reviews.author: nansy g.

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE FOR WALKING YOUR DOG !!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for walking my Golden Maxx. For years I've walked Maxx and waited for us to get home for him to drink water. With this product, which fits in by pocket he drinks a bottle of water , drinking at various intervals during our walk.I feel so guilty for not having something like this before for him.For some reason he refuses to drink from water bowls we would see on our walking path...there are several where we generally walk.Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Roque

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my thirsty pup
customer_reviews.text: Just used this for the first time with my dog when we took her to a disc golf course. It worked perfectly and kept my pup hydrated :-) I like the fact that it has a carabiner clip included - we clipped it on my backpack and will also be able to clip it on my dog's pack when we go hiking and backpacking.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Pet Owners!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son and daughter-in-law, who love going camping with their puggle and beagle. They really liked the bowls and look forward to keeping them in their vehicles whenever they travel. Since the bowls are collapsible and take up virtually no room, I got them both a small set and a large set so that they could have plenty of options for food and/or water.
customer_reviews.author: ManateeMama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and very lightweight, easy to collapse unlike some I've tried in the stores. I am a runner and need to get water for my dog from water fountains when I don't carry my hydration backpack and have storage space for a container. This can dangle from the handle of her leash without adding weight. This will work perfectly! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Deannas

customer_reviews.title: Great little bowls!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bowls because we travel a lot with our Italian Greyhound. We had another collapsible bowl made of coated nylon. It started to deteriorate, so we needed something different. These little bowls are just right. They collapse to a small size and fit in the door pockets of our vehicle. They clean up easily. A plus is we don't have to open them all the way to feed or water our fur baby. The only improvement would be sealable lids to hold water and food. I love the bright pink. It's easy to spot in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Maylamarie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for dog owners
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good time and packed nicely. They hold up really well and are very space-saving. It is very wobbly though so I would only use on-the-go for water OUTSIDE and only in emergency for food since kibble would probably be much denser. Just one accidental knock could make a huge mess. But great for on-the-go outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: D in NC

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for a thirsty (or hungry) pet on the go...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. Could be used as a food or water bowl. It's great for travel or walks with your dog. Just clip it to your bag or pant belt loop and you're ready to go. I've tried cupping water in my hand only to realize most spills out even as my dog is trying to drink fast. It collapses into into a thin/flat storable item and is sturdy on the ground so you don't have to worry about it tipping over either. Highly recommend 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: No lid
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and shape of the bowl and the clip is a plus but I ordered it quickly, needing a bowl for an outing. The picture led me to believe there was a lid. So as there is not, I also had to carry a bottle of water with me. This is my own fault for not reading about the product, but I wanted to warn other potential buyers that no lid is included. Otherwise the bowl is fine if you have water handy.I wouldn't have bought this product if I read more carefully!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and so convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Went on vacation with my dog during the summer. Just clipped them to my backpack with the included clips and off we went! I bought two. why I like this product: -well made and durable -easy to use, carry and store -large enough for food and water for a large dog -never have to worry about using someone else's bowl
customer_reviews.author: LisaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Okay - I admit - I don't have a dog ...
customer_reviews.text: Okay - I admit - I don't have a dog. I wanted a small "travel potti". I've really looked and looked. I looked at alternative options and figured - okay, this holds water and is washable and really compact. As soon as it arrived I knew I made the right decision. With small children and lots of travel and myself feeling more secure if i have "something" available in an emergency - this just seemed to fit the bill. It's collapsible size makes it really convenient to pop into a bag and if an emergency occurs at least you have the piece of mind that you have something available.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dianne

customer_reviews.title: Has a funny smell that my dog doesn't like
customer_reviews.text: Has a funky smell that my dog avoided until he was dying of thirst, even now he only drinks when he has to. I keep it in my vehicle, so maybe the heat intensives that smell. Washing it hasn't helped. But, it is convenient, if your dog isn't snooty about smells.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great bowls
customer_reviews.text: I have only had them for about a week. I use one daily. I thought at first that they were a little big and stiff, so it would be weird on my leash when I go for walks. But it is working out ok and my Bullmastiff and Dogue de Bordeaux really love the size and ease of them getting water. Their big faces can get as much water as they need.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C. Castle

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy, but they fold down into a small like ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so convenient for traveling with pets! I often take my dogs hiking and camping, and I always use these for their food and water dishes! They are sturdy, but they fold down into a small like circle that fits in just about any bag. I bought 3 of them: 2 for dog food and 1 large one for water! So far they have held up great.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Great bowl
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and big enough for my two large dogs to use at the same time. A bit pricey but worth the money, especially since I only had to buy one for two dogs. No toxic chemicals either, which is the main reason I bought it. On top of that, it is the cutest collapsible bowl I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: christmasgirl

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: I thought since these had an actual brand name that they would not be made in China. They do seem to be decent quality, but I would not have ordered if I had known they were made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect invention for long hikes with my dog
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect invention for long hikes with my dog. I just attach it to my backpack and away we go. It folds away flat when he is finished drinking and there is no mess and no room taken out of my backpack. Definitely recommended. I need to purchase a second one though. I accidentally left it outside with our dog and he loved it so much that he chewed it to pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This bowl works really well, and is easy to tote around on long walks and hikes for my dog. Super easy to wash out and wipe clean. Really recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: great, SMALL, bowl
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, *little*, bowl! We've been exploring Colorado's 14ers with our high energy vizsla and this little bowl is lightweight and compact. At first I'd been concerned it was too small (at only 1-1/2cups) but it ends up helping us conserve water as refilling is easy for us. When he's finished drinking it collapses easily and is small enough to fit in the doggy pack! We had previously used the nylon fold and zip style bowls but after less than a year it is leaking and will only serve for food.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Space saver so I could pack even more unnecessary clothes...
customer_reviews.text: I was in the middle of packing up in order to evacuate due to Hurricane Nate (I live south of New Orleans) and found the travel pet bowls on Amazon. I had ordered on Thursday and much to my surprise they arrived on Friday just a few hours before we had to leave! While the bowls are advertised to be for small dogs, I bought them for my cat. My cat and I love the bowls, they are super easy to clean, very sturdy, and most important they easily collapse so they don't take up much space! I would highly recommend these bowls for pets on long trips or for dogs on short walks to the park.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The carabiner also makes it easy to clip onto a purse/backpack
customer_reviews.text: This item definitely met my expectations. We have a 5 month old GSD that we take EVERYWHERE with us. I keep a bowl in my car & the other in my husband's car, so our little baby never gets thirsty when we're out. It's small enough for her to not overdrink, and if she leaves some water in her bowl-it isn't a lot either. The carabiner also makes it easy to clip onto a purse/backpack.
customer_reviews.author: laurzbellek

customer_reviews.title: the bowl is great, I collaps it and stick it in my ...
customer_reviews.text: the bowl is great, I collaps it and stick it in my tackle box, out to the garden, on road trips everywhere we go. It cleans up easy and looks like new. My puppy loves it to,
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Ok, Good SiE for a bigger Dog
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little sturdier Silicone... I've got Silicone Measuring cups and table spoon measures that fold like this, and my Measuring devices are thicker and more rugged than this, ALSO, I thought there was two, the picture shows two, so disappointed when I paid 10 bucks for 1, Come on Us women know the REAL COST, for this type of thing !!
customer_reviews.author: Lakota

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We just used this travel bowl for the 1st time today and my chihuahua loves it! I only expanded it to the 1st level, as it's a little too big for him when it's fully expanded. Lol. It seems that I'll need to be gentle when washing ithe because the top ring is a hard plastic and might separate from the silicone. That's just an assumption though. I'll report back if that happens, but it honestly may not...
customer_reviews.author: You'll Never Get Out of This Maze

customer_reviews.title: give this a try !
customer_reviews.text: I tried to leave a review but it didn't go through so I'm trying again. This bowl was a perfect fit for my grand dog. I have one that is not very wide and he will not drink from it but this one is perfect. It is made with real good silicone and I love how it collapses The two tone colors make it stand out above the rest. It fits so nicely in the door of our truck and opens easily. This was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: grammyd

customer_reviews.title: Great Collapsible Dog Bowl!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, easy to use collapsible dog bowl! It seems to be made of strong material, and it's the perfect size for our dog park trips. The clip that came with it isn't working very well, but I have an extra one that works better. Other than the clip, the bowl itself is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jake K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love this water bowl we've been camping & it is very handy would give 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Grace Matherne

customer_reviews.title: Siberian Husky approved!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a pink and purple bowl. These bowls work great for my Siberian Husky that is 7 months old. The bowl is durable even if she chews on them and no holes! I love the clip on the bowl also when I take her hiking with me I can just clip the bowls to my backpack without taking up to much space! Great product I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Essential
customer_reviews.text: I keep this collapsible bowl in my car for when my furkids need a drink on the go. It's virtually flat when collapsed, so it fits anywhere. I used to use a larger plastic container but it would get in the way when I was packing up my car for a trip, so I needed something that would fit better and this exceeds those expectations. I also got the smaller bowls from this brand to use for meals on the go. They are great!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good size portable bowl for big dogs
customer_reviews.text: I need to exercise my 85 pound Malinois a few hours daily and in the summer he drinks a good amount of water and the dog fountains at the parks are either crowded, hogged by an aggressive dog, or non existent. This bowl allows for my dog to drink generously while he has his ball in the bowl at the same time (it's a quirk of his while exercising) and easy carrying as it folds up flat and can be clipped to the outside of a bag.
customer_reviews.author: LisaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good bowl, collapses flat, easy to bring along and can clip to another bag/gear.  Can use for food and water.
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are great and convenient when you are out with your dog. We even bring our dog's dinner with us if we are going to be out during her feeding time and she gobbles it down and then we add water to the bowl so she can wash it all down. This is our second of this bowl. We accidently left the first one at a restaurant. This brand is made well and will probably last years like the previous one. The clip is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to take on hikes
customer_reviews.text: Nice water bowl to take on hikes for thirsty dogs. Easy to clip on a belt loop or backpack and is a good size for giving dogs a drink during longer hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Williams

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product. Great service.
customer_reviews.text: Ok I admit it. The "dog bowl" is for me! I travel a lot and I prefer to have breakfast in my hotel room. Some granola, fruit and yoghurt are perfect for me and cheaper and better than the hotel breakfast. The size and travel-compatibility of this collapsible and perfectly sized "dog bowl" is perfect for road warriors like me! Woof!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Roth

customer_reviews.title: Easy Traveling
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15 pound white poodle. Having a small collapsible bowl tucked into a car door pocket is SO convenient for trips. Much better than any hard or collapsible bowl I have purchased in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Hermine I. Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Nice Size Collapsible Dog Bowls
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these once so far, but they seem sturdy and my German Shepard was able to get her water and food easily from the bowl. I was glad to get these because so many other collapsible bowls are very small. Win Win!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a dog fanatic. I have had at least one dog (mostly two) ever since 1984. As I am getting older, I am now making my furry friends carry their own supplies on our long walks. This bowl is awesome, and convenient, before this I had one of the 'waterproof' bags, but they are never waterproof. This is waterproof, and quickly dries to put back into his pack. I'm an old crippled Soldier - and this is most handy for me an my best friend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime is my Life

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I just hook it to my jeans ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I just hook it to my jeans when we walk over to the dog park. I do not like my dogs to drink water out of a communal bowl and my male drinks water like a camel. So it is large enough to him hydrated and light weight to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah R. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: I love this bowl and so do the dogs that I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this bowl and so do the dogs that I walk. I wish I would have ordered it sooner. When we walk by the golf course I fill the bowl at the drinking fountain and they both drink out of the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Kreger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This bowl is great. Sturdy, collapsible, awesome for travel or to just keep in the car. Plenty big enough for our large dog to drink from. He likes it and we do as well.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Great, light, travel bowl.
customer_reviews.text: Great travel bowl. Very light and folds up easily. I leave it attached it to the dog's leash and when we go on walks grab a bottle of water or am ready to use fountains. I've had the smaller bowl for a year or two and it's still going strong - but we often have playdates with another dog and I wanted a larger bowl they could share and the 5 cup bowl is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: You never realize how important that little carabiner on the ...
customer_reviews.text: You never realize how important that little carabiner on the bowl is until you're hiking and the bowl is wet from just watering your dog. hook it on to your pack and blamo!
customer_reviews.author: JRo.

customer_reviews.title: Great portability, but kind of hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: These worked very well for me when I took my cats to Europe with me. I like the portability of them, and that they expand into larger bowls. They are kind of hard to clean though. There are quite a few stains on them from where wet cat food was in them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Sears

customer_reviews.title: Nifty idea.  Good size for larger dogs. Appear well made.
customer_reviews.text: We just received these bowls and I freed them from their packaging and washed them just to be on the safe side. They appear to be well made and they flatten to almost nothing. While showing it to our Geeman Shepherd he did try to gnaw on it. The carabiners they supplied seem to be a bit more reliable than most freebie carabiners carabiners. We're looking for an opportunity to take them with us on a trip.
customer_reviews.author: JessB

customer_reviews.title: ... shipping came Just in time and i am very satisfied with this product no damages whatsoever i purchased this ...
customer_reviews.text: The shipping came Just in time and i am very satisfied with this product no damages whatsoever i purchased this as a gift for an aunt who has a new tea cut puppy and this is the Perfect size. The specifically wanted this product and i am so joyed to be able to find it and have it shipped just in time! thanks you Prima Pet!
customer_reviews.author: London

customer_reviews.title: Milo proof
customer_reviews.text: We bicycle every day with Milo our Breaded Collie. We have went through a few different bowls and this is the one that passes the test every day. Easy to clean, Easy to use and very strong and takes a beating. We bought two for each set of bikes. The colour even matched his harness.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Traveling
customer_reviews.text: Received product as described. This has been the best fix for water when road-tripping with my dog. When you stop pull the bowl out, stick your hand in the middle and push down to expand the bowl, pour water in, let your animal drink, hold the edges and push down to collapse and store away without taking up extra room.
customer_reviews.author: Shae Napier

customer_reviews.title: lightweight and easily portable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bowl and the fact that it came with a little carabiner clip. It collapses easily and barely takes up any space. Looking forward to using it on hikes with my doggo this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every dog owner needs this!(:
customer_reviews.text: I love this collapsible bowl for my dog. Its easy to just wash, let it dry, then fold together and hang up. I think it was a great idea to put the clip on there also. I go camping and hiking with my dog and i can just clip it to my bag and go. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaMae

customer_reviews.title: Great for snacks!
customer_reviews.text: Cooley collapsible. Dogs love em. They dont tink when their collars hit them. using them out and about works a charm too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The large size bowls are great for our 50lb heeler mix
customer_reviews.text: The large size bowls are great for our 50lb heeler mix. I bought two so I don't have to search for them when I'm heading out the door....one in my backpack and one in my doggie travel bag. With two kids and a dog I like to be prepared! The rim with the carabiner is a hard plastic so the carabiner doesn't tear off like it has with other collapsible bowls I've had. These work great for travel or quick water breaks on a hike. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Twins Fan

customer_reviews.title: I would eat cereal out of this bowl!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, easy to travel with dog bowl. I love that the size is just right for our Golden Retriever. She has two, one for food and one for water. My husband has traveled with this while hiking, as it hooks on just about anything, and collapses. Make sure you order two, as this is just for one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rector

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and connvenient
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good material very convenient! Especially with the attachable latch they include. However, I will say I only gave 4 stars due to the fact that i thought it was 2 bowls for that price. It. Could have been my own misjudgment but I was super busy and saw that it said "food AND water bowl" and there are two bowls on the picture. Maybe make it a little more clear that it comes with 1 bowl only.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my very very picky kitty. I like that the depth of the bowl can be adjusted depending on how far you extend the base. Great for dry or wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and can take anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was 2 bowls but its just one but i love it. Its super cute and goes well with all my dogs pink things. Cleans easy and small enough to take anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Bunny.Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Won't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect for when I take my dog to the park. It is completely flat and I hook it to a belt loop while walking my dog. It opens up to a fairly large bowl that allows more than adequate water For him. Afterwords I shake it out, and connect to my belt and away we go. I had many people at the dog park asked me where they could get the product. Won't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: So great, super light and expands perfectly whenever I need ...
customer_reviews.text: So great, super light and expands perfectly whenever I need it. I got this for my pug in the size large, because they have wider faces and no snout. Highly recommend. Very handy clip makes it easy NOT TO FORGET on big trips, just tack it on the side of his carry on bag. Stows beautifully in his overnight pack. Washes super easily in a dishwasher but easy enought by hand, too.
customer_reviews.author: meowmeow

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I had planned to use these collapsible bowls in the cars and so far my schnauzer likes drinking out of them and they're easy to use and store. Of course, she sees me pour my bottled water in the bowl, so it must be a good thing. They appear to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Apple pie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: Loved the colors and the versatility of the bowls, however - didn't make it past 1 week. My puppy chewed right around the rims and broke them off.
customer_reviews.author: Genesis Ramprashad

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly when I'm out and about for water for my dog. I love the clip as well and that it folds down
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hanes

product_meta.title: Prima Pets Collapsible Silicone Food & Water Travel Bowl with Clip for Dog and Cat, Small (1.5 Cups) & Large (5 Cups)
product_meta.description:
Size:SMALL (1.5 CUPS)| Color:PINKPrima Pets Collapsible Travel Bowl is ideal for outdoor and home use. This non porous and non-absorbent travel bowl is made of BPA-free material. The bowl provides the ideal solution for pet parents on the go. This portable pet bowl is collapsible and folds down to less than 1/2 inch for easy storage or transport and pops back up for use. Each bowl can hold a capacity of 1.5 cups. 

Perfect for travel, parks and walks 
Collapsible to less than 1/2-inch to fit in most pockets 
Made of durable non-porous food grade silicone and sturdy BPA-free plastic rim 
Top rack dishwasher safe 
BONUS: Includes Quick Release Carabiner Clip to conveniently latch bowl to your leash. (Please note the carabiner clip is not suitable for climbing) 

1.5 cups size measures 5" wide x 2.2" tall when opened. 
Sturdy 2.6" bowl base prevents bowl from tipping over. 
Great size for XS to Medium Dogs and All Cats 

Colors Available: Aqua, Purple, Pink and Grey 

Prima Pets is committed to creating quality pet products! 

CARE INSTRUCTIONS: For proper hygiene, always wash pet products after each use to prevent cross contamination and spreading of germs. Dishwasher Safe (Top Rack)
feature_bullets: OVER 750 REAL REVIEWS Gave Us 4.7 out of 5 STARS: All of our Prima Pets Travel Dog Bowl reviews are authentic. None of our "Verified Purchase" reviewers were given free or discounted products for their “unbiased" review.

PORTABLE & CONVENIENT: Expands for use and collapses for travel. Folds down to only 0.5 inches. Great for outdoor or indoor use at home and easy to take on the go. We've made a travel dog bowl that is adjustable and light weight while still ensuring optimum sturdiness.
SIZE: Measures 5" wide x 2.2" tall when opened. Holds up to 1.5 Cups of Food or Water - Suitable for Small to Medium Dogs and All Cats. Sturdy 3.6 inch Bowl Base prevents bowl from tipping over.
BONUS: Includes Quick Release Carabiner Clip to Conveniently Latch to your Leash. (Please note the carabiner clip is not suitable for climbing)
100% PET SAFE: Food Grade Silicone Bowl with BPA Free Plastic Rim. (Please DO NOT allow dogs to bite or chew bowl as it will cause damage to bowl.)
